form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FS-398

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 PLACE DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA San Pedro, California MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS DATE OF EXAMINATION DEC 16 1968 CITY U. AS the DEPARTMENT COUNTRY A-17 182 973 IMMIGRATION , TION SERVICE NAME AGE SEX 300 certify NORTH that LOS on the above date I-examined REFT MR. YOH HAN LEE LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90012 54 M I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Actinomycosis Granuloma Inguinale Ringworm of scalp Amebiasis Keratoconjunctivitis, infectious Schistosomiasis Blastomycosis Leishmaniasis Syphilis, infectious stage Chancroid Leprosy (Hansen's Disease) Trachoma Favus Lymphogranuloma Venereum Trypanosomiasis 600 Filariasis Mycetoma Tuberculosis (pulmonary or extrapulmonary) Gonorrhea Paragonimiasis Yaws MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A, B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): CLASS B - Late, latent syphilis, adequately treated, non-infectious. Chest X-ray report Normal chest from Dr. Blood serological report Ltr. dtd. 12-23-68 from Co. of Los Angeles Health Dept. stating adequately treated for syphilis. Other special report(s) (when needed) U. S. Public Health Service 314 Federal Building from Dr. San Pedro, California SIGNATURE OF MEDIC ALL ECONICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT Ivan S. Cliff, M.D. Chief of Medicine February 5, 1969 FORM *Continue on reverse side if necessary. " GPO 1966 O 209-864 C43-16-77593-1 FS-398 10-65 miR.
